channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Snapped: The Long Feng Art Car – A Cultural Phenomenon (A Photo Essay)
item.description: 📸 Experience the vibrant fusion of art and music with the Long Feng Art Car! Dive into the cultural phenomenon in our exclusive photo essay! 🎨🚗 #art #music #culture

item.title: Indie Music Leaders Organize Against UMG-Downtown Deal With New Campaign: ‘A Serious Threat’
item.description: Indie power unite! 🚀 Standing strong against big deals with major vibes. Time to show 'em what we're made of! 🎶 #IndieStrong

item.title: 50 Cent Celebrates Taylor Swift’s Shoutout on ‘Popping’ Album ‘Life of a Showgirl’
item.description: 🎉 Cheers to unexpected collabs! @50cent x @taylorswift 👀🎶 #MusicMashup #SurpriseDuets

item.title: Guns N’ Roses Announce Expanded Vinyl Reissue of Live Era ’87-’93
item.description: 🌹🎸 Dive into the past with Guns N’ Roses! 🎶 Expanded vinyl reissue of Live Era '87-'93 coming soon! 🔥 #VinylRevival #GunsNRoses

item.title: Yungblud Announces 2026 North American Tour
item.description: 🎸 Ready to rock with Yungblud in 2026? Get your punk vibes ready for an epic North American tour! 🤘 #Yungblud2026Tour

item.title: Watch Stevie Nicks Perform Fleetwood Mac’s “Angel” For The First Time In 42 Years
item.description: ✨ Stevie Nicks blesses us with the magic of "Angel" after 42 years! 🌟 Dive into this legendary moment now! 🎶 #StevieNicks #FleetwoodMac #Angel

item.title: One Direction’s Zayn Malik and Louis Tomlinson Will Reunite for New Docuseries
item.description: 🚀 Exciting news alert! Zayn Malik and Louis Tomlinson are teaming up for an epic docuseries! 🎬 Who's ready for the reunion? 🔥 #OneDirectionForever

item.title: Super Furry Animals Share Previously Unreleased 2005 Song “Rock ‘N’ Roll Flu”
item.description: 🎶 Unleashing some hidden gems! Super Furry Animals drop vintage track "Rock ‘N’ Roll Flu" from the vault 🚀🔥 #MusicDiscovery

item.title: ‘No Hesitation’: George Michael’s Estate ‘Delighted’ Over Taylor Swift Using ‘Father Figure’
item.description: 🎶 George Michael's estate gives the ✨ green light ✨ to Taylor Swift for using 'Father Figure' – spreading joy and good vibes! 🌟 #MusicNews

item.title: Prince and The Revolution’s Around the World in a Day Gets 40th Anniversary Reissue
item.description: 🎉 Let's celebrate 40 years of Prince's iconic album! Get ready to groove all over again with this special reissue 🎵 #PrinceRevolution40

item.title: Guided By Voices – “Phantasmagoric Upstarts”
item.description: 🚀 Dive into the dreamy new world of Guided By Voices with their latest album "Phantasmagoric Upstarts"! 🎶💫 #NewMusicAlert

item.title: Twin Shadow Announces New Album Cadet: Hear “Half Asleep”
item.description: 🎶 New vibes incoming! @TwinShadow's album Cadet is on the way. 💿 Have you listened to "Half Asleep" yet? #MusicNews

item.title: Finn Wolfhard Adapting Replacements Book Trouble Boys For New Movie
item.description: 🎬 Finn Wolfhard bringing the iconic story of The Replacements to the big screen! Let the music magic begin! 🎸 #TroubleBoysMovie

item.title: ‘NSync Celebrate ‘Unbreakable Bond’ on 30th Anniversary
item.description: 🎉 Dancing to 'Bye Bye Bye' in celebration of 'NSync's unbreakable bond! 💃🎶 #NSync30Years

item.title: The Residents to Perform 1979’s Eskimo for First Time on 2026 Tour
item.description: 🎶 The Residents are bringing the icy vibes with a rare performance of Eskimo on their upcoming tour! ❄️ #TheResidents #EskimoTour2026

item.title: Fifth Harmony Cheers on Lauren Jauregui as She Dances to ‘Work From Home’ on ‘DWTS’
item.description: Lauren Jauregui slays to 'Work From Home' on 'DWTS' as Fifth Harmony hyped her up! 🌟🎶 #GirlPower

item.title: Taylor Swift Interpolates George Michael’s “Father Figure” on The Life of a Showgirl
item.description: 🌟 Taylor Swift giving us major '80s vibes with a George Michael nod in her latest showstopper! 🎤💃 #PopRoyalty #MusicalMashup

item.title: Watch Public Enemy Perform a Career-Spanning Medley on Kimmel
item.description: 🎤 Public Enemy lights up the stage with an epic medley on Kimmel! 🔥 #LegendsAlive #MusicMagic

item.title: Sam Smith Will Bring Their ‘To Be Free’ Residency to San Francisco’s Castro Theatre
item.description: Guess who's turning up the Bay Area heat 🌟 Sam Smith is bringing all the feels to San Francisco's Castro Theatre with 'To Be Free' residency! 🔥 #SamSmith #ToBeFree

item.title: Corey Taylor, Billy Idol, Josh Freese to Perform The Cars and New York Dolls Albums at Benefit Show
item.description: 🌟 Rock legends unite! Corey Taylor, Billy Idol, and Josh Freese are bringing The Cars and New York Dolls to life at a special benefit show! 🎸 #RockAndRollRescue
